title: Looking to make a Bronze/Silver 5's Team
body:
The positions needed to be filled are top mid support and ad carry. 
to join answer the next questions
age:
Position(lane):
Rank: 
Do you take criticism well:
What other roles do you play(what is your second role):

replies.body:
Age: 18
Position: AD Carry BUT I can play any position proficiently.
Main Champs: My main is ezreal but I can play every adc other than quinn on a proficient level.
My 2nd role would have to be Mid: Viktor, Xerath, Twisted Fate, Ahri but I have others.
Top: Vlad, Kennen, Jayce, Renekton, and Sion.
Jungle: Xin Zhao, Sejuani, Vi, and Lee Sin.
Support: Taric, Lulu, Janna, Leona, Sona, Soraka, Annie, Nami, and Braum
Rank: Bronze 2
Do I take criticism well? I take it very seriously because I want better myself.
Side Note: Tell me if you have Skype or not. I'd vastly prefer if you had Skype.

age:16
pos: top/adc/jung
rank:b4 ----was silver 4 last season

> [{quoted}](name=Ingui Queen Yoon,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=9zRYFzyL,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-03-30T19:37:41.083+0000)

> Position(lane): Support

hey, well what are your 3 main support champs and also add me on league so we can start this thing! :)

ADC: Varus, Sivir (Rarely Play)
Jungle: Malphite, Shyvana

supp (blitz, nami, rammus), jg (voli, ww, still working udyr) mid (tf, ziggs, heim), adc (graves, caitlyn, ashe)
